price: 90. Mpe soki azali o kati ya bato ya loboko ya mobali,
arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنۡ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā in kāna min aṣḥābi al-yamīni
